item.title: How to Update
item.description: üí° Learn more about semantic versioning and advanced range syntax. Check for outdated packages npm outdated Update npm packages Bump the versions in the devDependencies section of ./package.json. Next, run: npm update Update Hugo In ./package.json, bump the Hugo version: "otherDependencies": { "hugo": "0.91.2" } Next, run: npm install Clean install npm run clean:install Next, run: npm install Resources npm-outdated npm-update

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Problems updating npm packages npm run clean:install Next, run: npm install Problems with cache Delete the temporary directories: npm run clean

item.title: FAQ
item.description: What’s with the name? Hyas used Atlas üôè as a starting point. In Greek mythology, Hyas was the son of the Titan Atlas and the Oceanid Aethra. Footer notice? Please keep it in place. Keyboard shortcuts for search? focus: Ctrl + / select: ‚Üì and ‚Üë open: Enter close: Esc Other documentation? Netlify Hugo Can I get support?
